Interface RulesInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
CaptureRules, NaturalRules, OoocRules
public interface RulesInterface

  • Method Details

    • getNextRemovedPiece

      int[] getNextRemovedPiece()
      Returns:
      one of the pieces removed since last checked

    • getNextAddedPiece

      int[] getNextAddedPiece()
      Returns:
      one of the pieces added since last checked

    • setBoard

      void setBoard(Board newBoard, int numPlayers)
      set up the board and ownership of the pieces (if eligible)
      Parameters:
      newBoard - board for this game
      numPlayers - players to split pieces between

    • handleMove

      int handleMove(int y1, int x1, int y2, int x2, int playerNumber)
      handle a move a player sent
      Parameters:
      y1 - coords of starting position
      x1 - coords of starting position
      y2 - coords of ending position
      x2 - coords of ending position
      playerNumber - the player which issued this move
      Returns:
      move status. -1 - invalid move, 0 - valid move that doesn't end the turn, 1 - valid move that ends the turn

    • checkEndCon

      boolean checkEndCon(int player)
      checks if the board is in a state that ends the game and determines the winner
      Parameters:
      player - player that just moved
      Returns:
      if the game has ended

    • getWinner

      int getWinner()
      checks the winning player. Defined if checkEndCon returned true
      Returns:
      the winning player
